alert.note: Alert for Covington; Forrest; Jones; Lamar; Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN MARION...FORREST... EASTERN COVINGTON...LAMAR AND JONES COUNTIES THROUGH 1245 AM CST... At 1200 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hebron to near Rawls Springs to near Sandy Hook. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hattiesburg, Laurel, West Hattiesburg, Ellisville, Oak Grove, Rawls Springs, Moselle, Eastabuchie, Pine Burr, and Sandy Hook around 1205 AM CST. Petal, Baxterville, and Pine Ridge around 1210 AM CST. Tuckers Crossing around 1215 AM CST. Purvis, Sunrise, and Macedonia around 1220 AM CST. Ovett and Mill Creek around 1225 AM CST. McLaurin and Rock Hill around 1235 AM CST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
